mapper.select: select FNC.FUNCTION_ID AS FUNCTION_ID , FNC.FUNCTION_NAME AS FUNCTION_NAME , FNC.FUNCTION_TYPE AS FUNCTION_TYPE , FNC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , FNC.PROJECT_CODE AS PROJECT_CODE , FNC.CATEGORY_CODE AS CATEGORY_CODE , FNC.SERVICE_ID AS SERVICE_ID , decode(FNC.SERVICE_ID, null, '', '[' || FNC.SERVICE_ID || '] ' || SVC.SERVICE_NAME) AS SERVICE_NAME , FNC.SCREEN_ID AS SCREEN_ID , decode(FNC.SCREEN_ID, null, '', '[' || FNC.SCREEN_ID || '] ' || SCR.SCREEN_NAME) AS SCREEN_NAME , FNC.REG_USER_ID AS REG_USER_ID , FNC.REG_DATETIME AS REG_DATETIME , FNC.UPD_USER_ID AS UPD_USER_ID , FNC.UPD_DATETIME AS UPD_DATETIME from AP_FUNCTION FNC , AP_SERVICE SVC , AP_SCREEN SCR where FNC.FUNCTION_ID = #{FUNCTION_ID} and FNC.SERVICE_ID = SVC.SERVICE_ID (+) and FNC.SCREEN_ID = SCR.SCREEN_ID (+)

select F.FUNCTION_ID AS FUNCTION_ID , F.FUNCTION_NAME AS FUNCTION_NAME , F.FUNCTION_TYPE AS FUNCTION_TYPE from AP_FUNCTION F where 1=1 AND F.PROJECT_CODE = #{PROJECT_CODE}
AND (UPPER(FUNCTION_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchKeyword}) || '%' OR UPPER(FUNCTION_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchKeyword}) || '%')
AND FUNCTION_ID LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{FUNCTION_ID}) || '%'
AND FUNCTION_NAME LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{FUNCTION_NAME}) || '%'
ORDER BY F.FUNCTION_NAME

select F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID AS FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID , F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_NAME AS FUNCTION_ALIAS_NAME , F.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER , F.REG_USER_ID AS REG_USER_ID , F.REG_DATETIME AS REG_DATETIME , F.UPD_USER_ID AS UPD_USER_ID , F.UPD_DATETIME AS UPD_DATETIME from AP_FUNCTION_ALIAS F where F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID = #{FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID}
mapper.sql:
select F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID AS FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID , F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_NAME AS FUNCTION_ALIAS_NAME , F.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER , F.REG_USER_ID AS REG_USER_ID , F.REG_DATETIME AS REG_DATETIME , F.UPD_USER_ID AS UPD_USER_ID , F.UPD_DATETIME AS UPD_DATETIME from AP_FUNCTION_ALIAS F where 1=1
and F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID like ('%' || UPPER(#{FUNCTION_ALIAS_ID}) || '%')
and F.FUNCTION_ALIAS_NAME like ('%' || #{FUNCTION_ALIAS_NAME} || '%')
order by 3 ASC
mapper.select: SELECT S.CATEGORY_CODE AS CATEGORY_CODE , S.SCREEN_ID AS SCREEN_ID , F.FUNCTION_ID AS FUNCTION_ID , S.SCREEN_NAME AS SCREEN_NAME , S.SCREEN_TYPE AS SCREEN_TYPE , S.VIEW_TYPE AS VIEW_TYPE , S.REG_DATETIME AS REG_DATETIME FROM AP_SCREEN S INNER JOIN AP_SCREEN_FUNCTION SF ON S.SCREEN_ID = SF.SCREEN_ID INNER JOIN AP_FUNCTION F ON SF.FUNCTION_ID = F.FUNCTION_ID WHERE F.FUNCTION_ID = #{FUNCTION_ID}
